location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Quarter-final results at the $ 6 million Grand Slam Cup tennis tournament on Friday : Goran Ivanisevic ( Croatia ) beat Mark Woodforde ( Australia ) 6-4 6-4

Let's think step by step.

1. Grand Slam Cup: This is the name of the tennis tournament.
2. $ 6 million: This is the monetary value of the tournament.
3. Quarter-final: This refers to the round in which the match took place.
4. Friday: This is the day on which the quarter-final match occurred.
5. Croatia: This is the location or country of Goran Ivanisevic.
6. Australia: This is the location or country of Mark Woodforde.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Quarter-final results at the $ 6 million Grand Slam Cup tennis tournament on Friday : Goran Ivanisevic ( Croatia ) beat Mark Woodforde ( Australia ) 6-4 6-4

Let's think step by step.

1. Grand Slam Cup: This is the name of the tennis tournament. It is an organization that is hosting the event.
2. $ 6 million: This is the monetary prize pool for the tennis tournament. It is not an organization but rather the financial aspect of the event.
3. Quarter-final: This refers to the round of the tennis tournament where the match between Goran Ivanisevic and Mark Woodforde took place. It is not an organization but rather a stage or round in the tournament.
4. Goran Ivanisevic: He is a tennis player. He is not an organization but rather an individual participant in the tournament.
5. Croatia: This is the country of origin for Goran Ivanisevic. It is not an organization but rather a geographical location.
6. Mark Woodforde: He is also a tennis player. He is not an organization but rather an individual participant in the tournament.
7. Australia: This is the country of origin for Mark Woodforde. It is not an organization but rather a geographical location.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.
1. Grand Slam Cup: This is the organization hosting the tennis tournament.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
